name: Off Road Challenge (itch)
description:
A driving game made for the Natures beauty jam.

Used Unity3D and lots of assets to create this one.

Gaia Pro, Edy's vehicle physics, Realistic Engine Sounds, various Synty studio assets. Animals (with AI) from Polyperfect. Rewired for that painless input management. Waypoint indicators, Special FX shaders. Mesh deformation.

I just wrote a few lines of code to stitch it all together, and made the speedometer myself :)
